name: LAIKA (Moving Pixels)
description:
LAIKA

Your first car, the Laika is now an old rust bucket.

Can you keep it alive through this roadtrip?

Just like your old laika, this game is pretty rough around the edges, but it can be charming.

Original Lundum Dare 46 Jam submission: Keep it alive
I'll be finishing the game after the jam's voting ends.

Audio: "In The Hall of the Mountain King" by Kevin MacLeod
Fonts: "PICO-8" by by zep.p8 and "kremlin" by Vic Fieger
Color Pallete: "Andrade Gameboy" by Andrade
